headline: Outdoor Power Equipment Global Outlook Report 2026: A $48.2 Billion Market by 2030 from $35 Billion in 2024 with Deere & Co., Husqvarna, HONDA, Stanley Black & Decker, and Toro Group Dominating
summary: The global Outdoor Power Equipment Market, valued at USD 35 Billion in 2024, is projected to reach USD 48.20 Billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 5.48%. Key trends driving this growth include technological advancements and the rise of lithium-ion batteries enhancing efficiency and sustainability. Noteworthy innovations include autonomous robotic mowers and improved battery packs. North America leads market growth due to vast geographical landscapes and robust infrastructure investments. summary: The Europe Agriculture Equipment Market is anticipated to grow from 249,096 units in 2025 to 271,753 units by 2031, reflecting a CAGR of 1.46%. headline: US Agriculture Equipment Market Research Report 2026-2031: John Deere, CNH Industrial, AGCO & Kubota Dominate Through Precision Farming and Automation Investments
summary: The U.S. Agriculture Equipment Market is projected to grow from 300,214 units in 2025 to 345,669 units by 2031, at a CAGR of 2.38%. Tariffs on raw materials like steel and aluminum challenge local manufacturing. Precision farming, driven by GPS and cloud analytics, and a shift towards electric, compact machinery are transforming the market. headline: 1 Industrials Stock to Consider Right Now and 2 Facing Headwinds
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. Their momentum is also rising as lower interest rates have incentivized higher capital spending. As a result, the industry has posted a 21.9% gain over the past six months, beating the S&P 500 by 16 percentage points.
